name: @berlinsms/captcha-wrapper
description: jQuery-Plugin to wrap different kinds of captchas. The libraries of the unused captchas are not loaded.

scripts.deploy: npm run build && svn commit && git push && npm login && npm publish --access public && npm unpublish @berlinsms/captcha-wrapper@1.0.3 --force

author: haka for berlinsms <service@berlinsms.de> (https://www.berlinsms.de)
